unnormalised: Okay, return policies, the real deal-breaker! Seriously, if I can't return something easily, like a kurta from that Fabindia sale gone wrong, I'm out. Had a terrible experience once returning a defective phone bought online. Took ages! Needs to be simpler, like returning something at a local D-Mart during Diwali shopping rush. And what about that biryani set my aunt gifted me? Too many pieces! A hassle-free return makes all the difference, ya know?
